    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        the entry point to the program, where all the magic happens
        Parameters:
        args - user input from the console

      • simulation

        public static void simulation(boolean[][] currentWorld,
                              boolean[][] nextWorld,
                              int time,
                              int frames)
        simulates the game of life on a DrawingPanel
        Parameters:
        currentWorld - a 2D array which serves as a reference to create the nextWorld
        nextWorld - a 2D array that becomes populated using currentWorld as a reference
        time - the time between each frame in ms
        frames - the number of frames the simulation will run for

      • clear

        public static void clear(java.awt.Graphics g,
                         boolean[][] world)
        clears the drawing panel to a white canvas
        Parameters:
        g - graphics object on the drawingPanel you want to clear
        world - the array reprenting the world being displayed

      • clone

        public static void clone(boolean[][] currentWorld,
                         boolean[][] nextWorld)
        clones a given array to another, will copy all of the elements but will not change the location in memory
        Parameters:
        currentWorld - the world to be changed
        nextWorld - the world to be copied from

      • draw

        public static void draw(boolean[][] world,
                        java.awt.Graphics g)
        draws one frame of the simulation
        Parameters:
        world - the 2D array representing the current world
        g - the Graphics object used to draw the world on the panel

      • randomColor

        public static java.awt.Color randomColor()
        creates a random color
        Returns:
        the random color

      • writeToFile

        public static void writeToFile(boolean[][] world,
                               java.io.PrintStream fileWriter)
        writes a 2D array represeting a world to a given file
        Parameters:
        world - the world to be drawn
        fileWriter - the PrintStream object used to wrtie the array to a file

      • generateNext

        public static void generateNext(boolean[][] currentWorld,
                                boolean[][] nextWorld)
        generates the next world per the rules describing conways game of life
        Parameters:
        currentWorld - the array holding the infomation to be used as reference
        nextWorld - the array to be populated using currentWorld and a set of rules

      • neighbors

        public static int neighbors(boolean[][] currentWorld,
                            int row,
                            int index)
        calcualtes the number of live neighbors for a given cell
        Parameters:
        currentWorld - the world to checked for neighbors of a specific cell
        row - the row the current cell is in
        index - the index within the row of the current cell
        Returns:
        the number of live neighbors the specified cell has

      • populateWorld

        public static void populateWorld(java.util.Scanner fileScan,
                                 boolean[][] world,
                                 int columns,
                                 int rows)
        populates an array based off the contents of a specified world .txt file
        Parameters:
        fileScan - a Scanner Object on a the file containing the world information
        world - the 2D array to be populated
        columns - the number of columns in the world described by the file
        rows - the number of rows in the world described by the file
